entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.AccessViolationException occurring in managed code on dotnet 7 #83242
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests crashing #83241
  • ILLink analyzer handling of IL3003 on properties and events #83235
  • Native AOT DWARF info contains many overlapping ranges #83233
  • vsdbg-ui stepping over interpolated string line in async Task method throws a null reference exception #83232
  • Android: IsolatedStorageFile path changes #83231
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add IReadOnlySet2 for speeeding up set operations #83229
  • [release/7.0] PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Http2_Test fails on porting PR #83226
  • JIT: Lift CSE limitations around type handles #83215
    Future
  • [Wasm] Out of bounds memory access in System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles tests #83214
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Numerics Normalization & Distance Metric Operations #83209
  • 64-bit division not getting optimized on 32-bit targets #83205
  • W3C Traceparent header is not set by HttpClient #83227
  • MAUI project with non-ASCII project name cannot release to my Android phone #83203
  • MAUI iOS Release mode crash: Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper delegate-invoke) bool <Module>:invoke_callvirt_bool_SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid (Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid)' while running in aot-only mode #83212
  • [API Proposal]: Implement ISpanParsable/Formattable for PhysicalAddress #83201
  • [mono][jit] Optimize loading constants from imm on arm64 #83199
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten 3.1.30 related filesystem related issue #83197
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 2 Regressions on 3/2/2023 6:22:31 PM #83218
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 1 Regression on 3/7/2023 1:52:33 AM #83217
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 8 Regressions on 3/1/2023 1:48:25 AM #83216
  • Consider allowing `RequiresUnreferencedCode` and `RequiresDynamicCode` attributes on properties and events #83194
    Future
  • Enable deduplication of generics in Xamarin.iOS build #83193
    8.0.0
  • Cannot make connection to Chromecast #83221
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryMarshal.CreateReadOnlySpan that takes `in` param #83191
  • Static DIM reabstractions don't need to be final? #83189
  • SourceLink info missing from unmanaged CLR PDBs #83184
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\pinnedlocal\\pinnedlocal.cmd #83172
  • Unable to cross-compile CoreCLR for Linux ARM vfpv4-d16 #83170
  • ILLink substitute BitConverter.IsLittleEndian as true constant #83169

Closed

  • NativeAOT: dwarfdump --verify produces thousands of warnings and errors #72552
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] x86 test failure involving field and division #83140
    8.0.0
  • Directory.Delete() fails with "Could not find a part of the path" when deleting files from SMB share in Azure durable function #83202
  • Provide custom marshaller for `USER_INFO_1` #81705
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not support custom property names through JsonPropertyNameAttribute #82730
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M10/b06595/b06595/b06595.sh #83174
  • FileSystemWatcher stops working after Exception #81226
    Future
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById fails to find "Europe/Kyiv" #83188
  • [API Proposal]: Json多态类型处理器，未知类型处理建议 #83160
  • Some hardware intrinsic ILLInk.Substitution entries may be unnecessary #83164
  • Failure: Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.RequiresCapability(t: \"RequiresAccessedThrough\") #83179
  • Ensure that the ref/*.cs files are consistent with what tooling produces #83166
  • mono_method_get_param_names not wraped with MONO_ENTER_GC_UNSAFE #83178
  • Compilation getting OOM killed during object writing #83180
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT does not honor new() constraint #80037
    8.0.0
  • enum_packedSlotLayout_NameHashMask is unused #82425
    8.0.0
  • Pax Headers incorrectly treated is invalid if value contains an '=' sign #81699
    8.0.0
  • not found AppContext.UnhandledException property #83175
  • Kestrel: Segfault when specifying default certificate on Ubuntu 20.04 #81964
    8.0.0
  • OSX infra issue - prereq check for 'pkg-config' missing #82240
  • Blazor WebAssembly dotnet 8 Preview 1 with AOT Crashes on Safari on iOS #83161
  • Investigate codegen for Vector128.GetUpper #59838
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2131973 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use IAttributeOperation for our attribute-based analyzers #83239
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update the Roslyn version our ref-pack generators reference to 4.5.0 #83238
    area-Infrastructure
  • [workloads] Add more win-arm64 entries in the net6 manifest #83237
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix missing branch target table update in jiterpreter #83236
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Revert "[wasm] Revert to using latest chrome for testing" #83234
  • [workloads] Mark the windows runtime packs workload as abstract #83230
    area-Build-mono
  • Massively simplify getBaseJitTypeAndSizeOfSIMDType and the general SIMD handle caching/lookup #83228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow 0-sized block ops #83224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Update the workload descriptions #83223
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] cold start benchmark with download throttling and latency #83220
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [no merge] call mono_pmip_u in the crash handler #83219
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Another attempt to fix stress tests #83211
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] code cleanup #83210
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test transport #83208
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Optimized loading imm on arm64. #83204
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implements correct handling of RequiresAssemblyFiles on properties and events #83195
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
  • [release/7.0] Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #83177
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize 'x < 0' #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: treat synthesized profile data as pgo data, fix finally weights #83185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable DwarfDump AOT test in Release #82862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll and System.Drawing.Common.dll #83137
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.5
  • JIT: Fix EQ/NE(relop/SETCC, 0) optimization #83144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add getNN_unaligned memory.ts APIs for potentially unaligned pointers #83213
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove cctor from BitConverter #83196
    area-System.Numerics
  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Add win-arm64 to wasm-tools in the net6 manifest #83162
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82855
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Port #82470 (disable EventPipe stack collection with environment variable) to 7.0 #82921
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82854
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.5
  • Backport #82480 (fix third argument to TypedArray.fill) #82572
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Swap order of OnError in FileSystemWatcher.ReadDirectoryChangesCallback on Windows #83121
    area-System.IO
  • Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #82810
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Rename ManagedVirtualMethodTable and adjust indices #83158
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [iOS] Add gss framework back into sample linker args #83182
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] delete the unused code for comparing. #83187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BLK and TYP_LCLBLK #83036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix RequiresAccessedThrough tests #83190
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix handling of required & init-only properties with custom property names in source gen. #83147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2131376 #83171
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [metadata] make mono_method_get_param_names external only #83183
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Try reducing memory pressure during object writing #83181
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.5
  • Call `FlushInstructionCache` in CFG test #83168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.16
  • [6.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82562
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.5

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Update emsdk #83244
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Stress testing gtSplitTree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • Test merging baseservices/threading #83143
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code and fix CI #81611
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • ignore expiration in NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test #83157
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger]Trying to fix CI with chrome latest version #81904
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable folding small-typed returned indirections #82846
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82210
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.5
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.5
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.16
  • Remove the defunct DiagnosticUtility/Fx classes from DataContractSerialization #82324
    area-Serialization
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix path for packing #83017
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix JSON required read-only properties used as parametrized ctor #78152
    area-System.Text.Json
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
